item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Black Bear  www.blackbearnh.com

Get a wristband from the host for drink specials from 6pm-8pm:

• $3 for draft beer, well & call drinks, and house wine

From 4pm-7pm the regular Black Bear food special is $5 appetizers.

After our specials end at 8pm, there's a regular Black Bear special of 2 for 1 draft beer.

Hope to see you all there!

HOST: Jason, contact number in RSVP.  AJ will be filling in 315-345-9348, texting might be best as it's some times noisy in there.  (Jason got Sick)

Please RSVP to give the proprietors an accurate estimate of how many people.  If you are only a "Maybe" for Happy Hour events please put this in your RSVP Comment.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: Look for / contact your Listed Host from the Event Description. (In this case A.J. 315-345-9348)
